posts.post_content:
It’s been about 2 months since these cards were stolen from my mailbox shortly after they were delivered. A police report was filed with local police and the USPS insurance claim was filed and denied, then appealed and denied again. 

Some of you may have seen my post(s)about these cards on other social media, but I figure it’s worth a shot to post them here. 

None of the LCS guys near me in MD have seen them. I haven’t seen them pop up for sale anywhere. Let me know if they look familiar or if you see them. 

Thanks.

Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk
